name: Sacred Ritual
text: Passive Your Shrines have "Your spells cost (1) less."

name: Favor of the Gods
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Favor of the Gods
text: Passive Minions adjacent to your Shrines have Taunt.
completedText: You triggered Favor of the Gods

name: Fortified Spirit
text: Passive At the start of each turn, restore your Shrines to full Health.

name: Everlasting Devotion
text: Passive Start the game with a copy of your Shrine.

name: Pact with the Loa
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Pact with the Loa
text: Passive Your Shrines revive in 2 turns instead of 3.
completedText: You triggered Pact with the Loa

name: Wrath of the Loas
displayName: Passive ability triggered: Wrath of the Loas
text: Passive Your Shrines have "Deathrattle: Destroy all enemy Shrines."
completedText: You triggered Wrath of the Loas

name: Boon Reaper
text: Passive Your Shrines have "Deathrattle: Draw cards until your hand is full."

name: Roaring Edifice
text: Passive Your Shrines have "Deathrattle: Cards in your hand cost (2) less."

name: Windfall Blessing
text: Passive Your Shrines have "Deathrattle: Give minions in your deck +1/+1."
